guild.description:
Ask and answer questions.

Rules:

🤔 Posts must be questions. This is a community dedicated to Q&A discussion, so post titles must be in the form of a question.

⁉️ No loaded questions.

📬 No spamming. Spamming comments or posts is not allowed.

😀 Be civil. Be nice. Harassment, trolling, and disruptive behavior is not allowed. Basically, don’t be a jerk.

🥾 Breaking these rules will result in posts being kicked and possibly an exile.

📜 Follow Ruqqus ToS. This is a given.

Ask and answer questions.

Rules:

📬 No spamming. Spamming comments or posts is not allowed.

guild.name: AskRuqqus

body:
Never heard of it. What makes it so weird? 

There's probably weirder out there, but Yakitate Japan always stands out in my memory. It's an anime about making bread, with epic battles and everything. Like seriously, what bread was the author smoking when he drew that?
body_html:
Never heard of it. What makes it so weird?

There's probably weirder out there, but Yakitate Japan always stands out in my memory. It's an anime about making bread, with epic battles and everything. Like seriously, what bread was the author smoking when he drew that?

body: Haven't watched and don't intend but probably something like Cafe Stille. I am not into Anime. I have only watched three in my life. School Rumble(Watched when I was 10 didn't get it and disliked it) Sailor Moon (Which I started watching this month) and Bubblegum Crisis (Yesterday). But those aren't weird I wouldn't class School Rumble as weird I just didn't enjoy it. I am sure there is plenty of weirder animes I just don't watch anime really.
body_html: Haven't watched and don't intend but probably something like Cafe Stille. I am not into Anime. I have only watched three in my life. School Rumble(Watched when I was 10 didn't get it and disliked it) Sailor Moon (Which I started watching this month) and Bubblegum Crisis (Yesterday). But those aren't weird I wouldn't class School Rumble as weird I just didn't enjoy it. I am sure there is plenty of weirder animes I just don't watch anime really.

body: The one where it's a bunch of school aged girls that ARE guns. They don't think they are... they ARE guns. As in, they take the form of school girls... but they ARE guns, and everyone treats them as such.
